refnamediv.refpurpose: Commit a transaction without closing it

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If called without an argument, this function commits the default transaction of the default link. If the argument is a connection identifier, the default transaction of the corresponding connection will be committed. If the argument is a transaction identifier, the corresponding transaction will be committed. The transaction context will be retained, so statements executed from within this transaction will not be invalidated. &return.success;
